name: Squid Defense
description:
This game was one of the first games I ever made, when I started out with game development.  It is almost over 3 years old now and i finished it in only 24 hours.

This game won't cost you more than 5 minutes.

The color sharks are attacking your home! You are a color squid soldier. Shoot the sharks with the right color, but if you hit them with the wrong color the sharks will become even more furious. Good Luck!
